# VZDiskImageCachingMode.uncached

**Case**

Disables data caching.

## Declaration

```swift
case uncached
```

## Disk image caching modes

- **VZDiskImageCachingMode.automatic**: Allows the virtualization framework to automatically determine whether to enable data caching.
- **VZDiskImageCachingMode.cached**: Enables data caching.

items.description: Allows the virtualization framework to automatically determine whether to enable data caching.
